TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleDateTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, class System.IComparable
Public Structure OracleDateTime Implements IComparable, INullable
public value class OracleDateTime : IComparable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable

summary.span: 表示日期和時間資料，值範圍從西元前 4712 年 1 月 1 日到西元 4712 年 12 月 31 日。

span.span: Represents date and time data ranging in value from January 1, 4712 BC to December 31, 4712 AD.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得物件，請呼叫方法。To obtain an object, call the method. 最小有效日期結構是 1/1/0001 00:00:00。The minimum valid date for an structure is 1/1/0001 00:00:00. 不過，Oracle 支援早在年 1 月 1、 4712 BC 日期。However, Oracle supports dates as early as January 1, 4712 BC. 若要繫結 BC 日期，請使用`String`參數及 Oracle TO_DATE 或 TO_CHAR 轉換函式的輸入和輸出參數，分別。To bind BC dates, use a `String` parameter and the Oracle TO_DATE or TO_CHAR conversion functions for input and output parameters respectively.

summary.span: 初始化 結構的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure.

summary.span: 表示 結構的最小有效日期值。

span.span: Represents the minimum valid date value for an structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小有效日期結構是 1/1/0001 00:00:00。The minimum valid date for an structure is 1/1/0001 00:00:00. 不過，Oracle 支援早在年 1 月 1、 4712 BC 日期。However, Oracle supports dates as early as January 1, 4712 BC. 若要繫結 BC 日期，字串參數及 Oracle TO_DATE 或 TO_CHAR 轉換函式用於輸入和輸出參數分別。To bind BC dates, use a String parameter and the Oracle TO_DATE or TO_CHAR conversion functions for input and output parameters respectively.
